name: Apple Lemon with Cinnamon Muffins
author: ROBY
summary: This is such a yummy, yummy recipe that my family and friends just love! Especially the men!
ingredients: 1 large Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored and chopped
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
In a bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder, and salt
In a separate bowl, cream together the 1/2 cup sugar, eggs, butter, lemon zest, lemon juice, and milk
Mix the creamed ingredients into the flour mixture until evenly moist
Spoon into the prepared muffin cups
Mix the 1 tablespoon sugar and cinnamon, and sprinkle over the tops of the muffin batter
Bake 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until a toothpick inserted in the center of a muffin comes out clean
Cool 1 to 2 minutes before turning out onto wire racks to cool completely
